I'm so lonely y'all I (17) am from a relatively small town in podunk west US. Almost everyone knows everyone-- with the city I'm in having a population just under 60,000. I don't get out much, I go to work and Walmart... otherwise, I don't do much. School's out for summer, and I have another month before my last year in high school. Most of my friends are older than me and from work, I have couple of other friends in town, and the rest are 3+ hours away. I don't talk to my friends often since none of us are super great texters, usually we'll talk and then get busy. I've been trying to text my friends more, but there's only so much my friends and I can talk about sine they're usually busy and have way more going on than me, and I'm 1-2 years younger than my friends outside of work, so they have a lot more on their plate. All my friends from work are 19-29 so there's not much I can do there, and even the people closer to my age are working full time, and its kinda weird for someone my age to hangout with a 21-29 year old man...

  
I also just got out of a 2 year relationship, and every time I start talking to someone something bad happens. One guy lied about being single, one guy just doesn't date people from work (reasonable), and all the other guys I've liked just fall off the face of the earth. 

  
I don't necessarily want a relationship, and I'm not outwardly looking for one, I'm just lonely and want to fill that void-- and as a hopeful romantic (I like to stay positive), I always find things to daydream about.

  
I've been praying about finding friends or things to do, but I'm just so fed up with being bored and lonely.

  
Thank you if you got this far!
